resources.string: Touch this button to show a colour chooser screen for the background colour of the widget.
Touch this button to show a colour chooser screen for the text colour of the widget.
Touch anywhere in this pane to select the saturation and value of the text colour of the widget.
Touch anywhere in this pane to select the saturation and value of the background colour of the widget.

This screen provides sliders to set the hue, red, green, blue, and opacity of the clock widget\'s background. You can also type in values for red, green, blue, and opacity or pick a colour from the map of saturation and value for a hue.

This screen provides sliders to set the hue, red, gree, and blue components of the colour of the clock widget\'s text. You can also type in values for red, green, and blue, or pick a colour from the map of saturation and value for a hue.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of red in the colour.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of green in the colour.
Move the thumb on this slider to adjust the amount of blue in the colour.

Move the thumb on this slider to set the hue. This will not modify the value or saturation, which can be set by picking a colour from the map pane. Black, white and grayscale colours have a saturation of zero, so changing their hue will have no effect.
